extracted-table.table-caption: Activation areas for the three contrasts considered. One-sided t-tests were used with a cluster correction controlling the FWER at 0.05 for a voxel-level feature-inducing threshold corresponding to p = 0.001. The voxel size of the normalized images was 2 × 2 × 2 mm3.

caption.p: Activation areas for the three contrasts considered. One-sided t-tests were used with a cluster correction controlling the FWER at 0.05 for a voxel-level feature-inducing threshold corresponding to p = 0.001. The voxel size of the normalized images was 2 × 2 × 2 mm3.

fn.p: x, y, z—peak coordinates in the Montreal Neurological Institute (MNI) space.
